full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 115 of 261 1276 LC6Cmax3 Kate - cross 1 A. Yes. 2 Q. But the rest was yours, tax free; correct? 3 A. Yes. 4 Q. You have requested assistance by the government to obtain what's called a U visa? 5 6 A. Yes. 7 Q. That's a special visa for people who claim to have been victims who assist the government; correct? 8 9 A. That is my understanding. 10 Q. And you have begun the process of filling out the application; correct? 11 12 A. No. 13 Q. You've never filled out an application? 14 A. I don't think I've begun that process, no. 15 Q. So if there is an application with your name on it, you don't know who filled that out? 16 17 A. I made an inquiry about it. I'm not sure that I filled out an application. 18 19 Q. But it is your goal to try to get the U visa; correct? 20 A. No, it is not. 21 Q. You do not want the U visa? 22 A. I do not want the U visa. 23 MS. STERNHEIM: May I have a moment, Judge? 24 THE COURT: You may. 25 MS. STERNHEIM: Judge, I'm handing up a copy of an SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018452
